amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to redirect $2 million within the Water and Related Resources Account toward projects with a public health benefit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Ruiz.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
